articles.author: Balazs Koranyi
articles.title: Euro zone inflation tumble pits ECB against markets - Reuters
articles.description: Euro zone inflation tumbled more than expected for a third straight month in November, challenging the European Central Bank's narrative that price growth is stubborn and fuelling bets on early spring rate cuts in defiance of the bank's explicit guidance.
articles.content: FRANKFURT, Nov 30 (Reuters) - Euro zone inflation tumbled more than expected for a third straight month in November, challenging the European Central Bank's narrative that price growth is stubborn an… [+4187 chars]

articles.title: Introduction of invasive mosquito species into Europe and prospects for arbovirus transmission and vector control in an era of globalization - Infectious Diseases of Poverty - Infectious Diseases of Poverty - BioMed Central
articles.description: Background Mosquito research in Europe has a long history, primarily focused on malaria vectors. In recent years, invasive mosquito species like the Asian tiger mosquito (Aedes albopictus) and the spread of arboviruses like dengue virus, chikungunya virus or …

articles.title: Enhancing Mobile Device Security: Applying the NIS2 Directive - MSSP Alert
articles.description: The European Union's Network and Information Systems Directive (NIS2) recommends mobile threat defense (MTD) solutions as vital tools to protect mobile devices.
